title: Dot Cotton's real hair REVEALED as June Brown makes dramatic transformation from EastEnders character
text:
Dot Cotton's real hair REVEALED as June Brown makes dramatic transformation from EastEnders character The EastEnders legend is celebrating her 90th birthday Share Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing!   
June Brown has been seen sporting short, red, curled hair, as Dot Cotton in EastEnders for over 30 years. 
But, in the documentary to celebrate her 90th birthday, the soap legend has revealed her REAL hair. 
And we genuinely can not believe how long it is! 
Getting out of character in the makeup room, she takes her Dot wig off and reveals her long, grey hair, complete with a blonde fringe. Read More This is how we all know Dot Cotton (Photo: BBC) But her wig is taken off (Photo: BBC) And her REAL hair is revealed (Photo: BBC) 
It then gets brushed out by the hairdresser and put up into a chignon. 
Speaking on June Brown at 90, she explained how she’s not similar to her character. 
She said: “She’s got a high opinion of herself and I don’t think I have. 
“She’s very pleased with herself.” Read More It's SO LONG (Photo: BBC) Genuinely shocking (Photo: BBC) 
Many of her close friends and EastEnders co-stars also praised the actress in the documentary. 
Rudolph Walker, who plays Patrick Trueman, said: “She’s a lady of immense experience, a lady of the world. 
“Getting to 90 is an achievement in itself, but getting to 90 and still working in this industry is remarkable and June is still there right up at the top. 
“She’s just an amazing lady.” 
*June Brown at 90 is on BBC One tonight at 8pm Like us on Facebook
